text:
Cully is an emerging consumer-focused bot that uses machine learning & messaging platforms to provide event recommendations. We're early stage, all roles below offer opportunity to plug in early & set the direction of the company.

We're based in Vancouver, BC, & prefer ONSITE & unfortunately can't offer visa support at this stage.

Hiring for 3 roles currently: - UX Designer (https://frontierfoundry.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mlmi/) - Int Dev (https://frontierfoundry.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mo98/) - Sen Dev (https://frontierfoundry.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0mo9n/)
